text: Hotelnya agak kecil dan jumlah kamar juga tidak banyak, di kamar furni serba bambu, kamar cukup luas dengan teras yang cukup santai, ac berfungsi dengan baik namun kran wastafel sempat macet. View nya indah jika berada di resto menghadap pantai, namun jika membawa anak kecil yang suka berlarian harap ekstra berhati2 baik di bagian belakang hotel yang tingginya lumayan kebawah pantai/batu maupun di depan hotel yang berada di depan jalan besar. Staff nya ramah2 bahkan terkadang mereka bertanya jika anda perlu bantuan.
title: Bambu

text:
Pondok Bambu is a lovely hotel set right on the beach in Candidasa. Whilst very casual it is extremely good value for money. It is located only a 5 minute walk from the Lotus Lagoon and directly opposite the popular Crazy Kangaroo bar and restaurant (owned by the same owner).
The rooms are very nice and very quiet, beds a little hard but pillows amazing. The bathroom is huge with plenty of hot water. Very well air conditioned and a fridge in the room, it has all you need. Set amongst butterfly filled gardens it is a lovely setting. 
A set menu Breakfast is served overlooking the water and the neighbouring islands in a beachside / pool side locale. 
The quality of the food, breakfast and lunch is excellent as it is a similar menu to Crazy Kangaroo.
The beach is coral filled and can maybe be swam in but looks good for snorkelling, with turtles swimming up to the shore at night.
Anyhow great value and I would thoroughly recommend.
title: Beautiful serene hotel on the beach

text: Everything about Pondok Bambu is great. Location, rooms, staff, pool, restaurant/bar, outlook over the ocean. The only thing the staff didn’t tell us was that if you ate across the street at the Crazy Kangaroo you would receive 10% discount on your food which is good to know as the restaurant does not serve dinner. We ate at the Crazy Kangaroo twice however only got our discount once when the staff saw us crossing the road. Will definitely return.
title: Great Place to Stay

text: Pondok Bambu was very comfortable.  Staff beautiful and friendly. Job very well done. Restaurant with lovely food and drink right on the water front.  Quite a way out of Denpasar but was picked up a5 the airport and delivered safely!!   I was doing a Wacky Jacky Quilt Tour and this was our accomadation.  Jacky’s Quilt shop is right across the road which was just ideal for our purpose.
title: Bali and Pondok Bambu

text: Our third stay at Pondok Bambu was just as relaxing as our previous stays. Great outlook, friendly staff, central location, spacious rooms, excellent breakfast, reasonable price. Looking forward to our next visit.
title: Still Great

text:
Room clean like that it had walk in shower. Garden's beautiful.  View fantastic. Lovely peaceful environment. Staff friendly aznd halpful. Walking distance to restaurants Warungs ATM's. Important to note you must pay on arrival. Perfect place to have some quiet time. I loved just sittin in the restaueant looking at the ocean andv
 listening to the waves. I stayed in room 5 next to restaurant. No noise from restaurant. Rooms 10 and 11 overlook the beautiful shaded pool and onto the ocean.
title: Peaceful

owner_response.text:
Thanks for your review.


Pay on arrival is because there are people disappearing without paying the bill first.
And we didn't know that but it seems to be normal by other hotels also.

Thank you again Joanne
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Only 14 rooms set in nice gardens.Oceanside,great pool,open air restaurant,good longtime staff,centre of town.Dive service on site.Rooms 11 and 12 are my picks.A bit more expensive but are larger,with a patio overlooking the pool and ocean
title: Favourite place

text:
We have always coming back for Pondok Bambu ever since the last 5 years whenever we visited Candidasa.
It truly gave the homey feeling.
The pool is super lovely and my kods love playing there (with supervision).

Food at the restaurant are great and offer plenty of choices.

The only downside is on our last stay as we waited for our son to woke up from his nap before checking out, we ordered lunch at the restaurant and being asked 3x to me and once to my husband about our bill (in different sentences). Working at hospitality industry myself, I knew it is important to beware of guests bills.
But asking for 4x to repeater guests who has no record of not paying bills was very annoying that I ended up paying it right after we ate as it is uncomfy to be suspected like that.

The rest of the bills throughout our stay were easily paid shortly after that as we always do. The receptionists team were great as always and Wayan Nami whom I had email conversation with was amazing!

Thank you for making our trip truly enjoyable most of the time.

We will still be back 😉
title: Enjoyable stay as always

owner_response.text:
Hi Junita

im very sorry to read this.
I think the staff was afraid to make a mistake again by letting people go without paying the room and the food.
it happen not so long ago that people stay at pondok with false id cards (police check this) and disapeared after a few days without paying they're bill from the room and the food.
but they where strangers.
i will talk to them that they don't have to do that by returning costumers that's ridiculous.

hope to see you back again and im happy that you enjoy our hotel.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed here for a week and everything was terrific. The cottages are not joined so its quiet and the whole place is very peaceful. Rooms have all conveniences you need, restaurant is good and breakfast is a menu choice and adequate. Pool is well looked after and not crowded as there is only 12 cottages and plenty of sunbeds. The only thing we found was TV reception was hit and miss and cable channels very limited. I would certainly return again.
title: A Good Choice

text:
Pondok Bambu is a lovely little hotel right on the seafront at Candidasa. It is very simply laid out with the straightforward reception leading onto two rows of basic, but very nice little cottages, a beautiful tropical garden runs down the middle and is planted around the cottages giving lots of privacy and a lovely outlook. It's very 'old Bali' in atmosphere, each bungalow having its own roomy porch with table, chairs and drying rack. The rooms are large with everything you need - comfy bed, plenty of storage, fridge, tv (if you actually want to watch it!), good aircon, ceiling fan, safe box. The only downside is that there is only one small window, which is a shame because the gardens are so delightful, but I guess it's also part of the 'old Bali charm'.The bathroom is big and very clean, but no window.
The restaurant is really excellent with some great Indonesian dishes (try the cap cai, saté) and a nice breakfast but 8 o'clock breakfast start seems a bit late when the restaurant offers such a superb view of the sunrise! There's a very nice and clean tropical pool area with two cottages that look directly onto it and beyond it the startlingly blue ocean. The view is incredible as you are right on the sea and it's a very pleasant place to while away some time. It's a short walk to the lotus lagoon and other places in the town. The hotel also offers dive and snorkelling packages if you are interested in that. If you are an arty/crafty person, there is a fantastic fabric and quilt shop right across the road - a definite plus for me! I could happily stay here for a long time.....so laid-back and uncomplicated.
title: I could happily stay here for a very long time!

photos.caption: The porch area and garden along the centre of the property
The cottages surrounded by tropical gardens

text:
We stayed a couple of nights here this year, and there was no question about which hotel we should stay at. We have been here before and the hospitality shown to us is first rate.
The accommodation is spacious, comfortable, and the beautiful gardens are always kept in tip-top condition. The restaurant (and the delicious food) is more than adequate, the service is always courteous and friendly, and the prices are very reasonable. The pool is always kept crystal clear, and the pool-side seating is comfortable, and enough of it that you don't have to fight for it, nor "reserve" it with towels.
The whole place seems to be run in a very friendly, and almost informal way. It is a treat to stay here. We thoroughly recommend it.
title: Our "Home" in Candi Dasa

text: We decided to stay here for 2 nights on our way to Gili islands as wanted to be closer to Padang Bai to catch the speedboat . The convenient location , Staff , restaurant , cosy pool , service , fast wi-fi , hot water , efficient air conditioning and a very good price all impressed us so much that we asked if we could stay here again on our return . Luckily they were available for 2 nights and we got to stay here again after our return from Gili . They organised airport pickup for us and were always quick and clear in their communication. Enjoyed wonderful meals and drinks in the restaurant , relaxing Balinese massage by the pool from local massage ladies and amazing seaview. Stayed in room 3 and 10A . Room 3 could do with some brighter lighting . Room 10 A upstairs was our personal favourite . The 2  sea / pool facing rooms were already booked so we couldn't get them but would be nice to stay there . Will surely come back for a longer stay next time .  Till then a big thank you to the team of Pondok Bamboo for a nice , relaxing holiday . Keep up the good work !
title: Fell in love with this place !

text: In the town centre,on the ocean,opposite the Crazy Kangaroo restaurant.Small,13 rooms,with a dive centre.Open air restaurant with good menu/ prices.Nice pool with kids section.Great staff,some long timers.Right on the waters edge,nice sunsets.
title: Always good value

text: The 4th star is for the service and the restaurant. When we arrived the room was badly illuminated, bathroom without bath curtain and no squeegee but on request the stronger lamps were put into place and we received a squeegee for the shower. After a few days we had only cold water in the shower, the problem was quickly solved by the receptionist who simply changed the batteries outside the room. The rooms are quite small but with a nice porch and definitely not quiet. In the night we still hear the noise from the street and in the morning a noise of the restaurant - and the cleaning staff but since we always had to be on time for diving, this was not a problem. Every day we received two bottles of water, fresh bed covers and towels. However the towels for the hands/face are very small. There is no shampoo/shower gel etc. The room is equipped with a kettle for boiling water with black tea bags. On the premise we saw rats and every morning there were some droppings on our porch. The view from the terrace is amazing and because of the see breeze it feels pleasant. The place has a power to attract really nice guests from over the world. We had good contact with an American family, some Australian couples and Swiss guys. The non-EU eastern Europe was not represented. The menu and quality of the food in the restaurant is great and the staff is very pleasant, always ready to go an extra mile. The excellent diving centre (Bambu Divers) situated on the premise receives own review.
title: Very basic rooms up for renovation, great see view

text:
I rarely write a poor review but felt the need for Pondok Bambu, as I booked over other options based on others' reviews.  

We booked a family room, as I was traveling with my parents and infant daughter and wanted to be close.  When we arrived, we found the road noise unbearable from the family room. No one slept.  The first morning there, we worked with the reception team to change rooms for which they charged us double the cost.  Throughout the week, we checked similar rooms at surrounding properties and found their prices were 20-35% above the going rate despite having no grass/garden and a near non-existent beach.  

In fairness, the restaurant food was very good and breakfast included was filling and tasty each morning.  At the same time, the staff were inattentive and seemed most concerned with how to increase our bill.  As an example, one waitress tried to tell me I needed to pay separate for my daughter's breakfast.

We were surprised and offended during check-out when we were asked to pay for airport pickup which was advertised as free.  It reinforced our belief that the staff was just out to make as much money off us as possible.

We did have a good experience with the dive center, but will review them separately.
title: DONT BOOK THE FAMILY ROOM: Booked because of the TripAdvisor rating, repeatedly disappointed

owner_response.text:
good morning

im sorry to hear that you had this experience.
we know that in that room you can hear the traffic but its never unbearable.
so you stay with 6 people in a room for 4 people for us no problem the only problem we have after is these kind of reviews.

So you change rooms, all other rooms are 2 persons and if needed we can put (read good) 1 extra bed per room so you go for 2 rooms with in all 2 rooms an extra bed and that cost 150.000rp per extra bed plus you rent 2 rooms do the math. we did all with normal rates what is for everybody the same. but you where thinking 6 persons in a 4 persons room is nice and cheap.

you could also choose for the hotels you where looking because if they are better and even cheaper why you stay? was it because your plan for a cheap holiday include service,tax and breakfast "i quote" " food was very good and breakfast included was filling and tasty each morning" "unquote"  goes up in flames and you had to pay just as much as a normal guest? i think so.

We offer free transportation go and back if you stay minimum 2 weeks, for a few days we don't drive for free to the other side of the island to pick you up.
and if its for a few days we offer transportation for a very low cost price.

Im happy that you enjoy our dive centre.

Regards

Managment Pondok Bambu Dive Resort.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
What can I say....I love coming here, as the ambience is different every time..
The sea can be rough with white peaks, or calm  with small boats bobing about...
The menu is terrific, fresh food daily, great drinks and delightful friendly staff.

I always have grilled prawns with avocado and chopped  tomatoes, washed down with a juice, also fresh...
title: Great views and delicious food...

text:
Great service and large rooms in a great location. Right across from Skippys, this is a place you would want to stay at for a quiet night in and a quiet day relaxing on the pool area. 

Breakfast was good not amazing
title: great service in good location

text: The food is great and affordable. Nice atmosphere in a garden setting with sea views. Staff is super friendly. We just chilled out at the pool and relaxed - perfect place for that. We didn't stay over, so I cannot comment on the accommodation, but the rooms look ok.
title: Favorite Eatery in Candidasa

text: Great menu selection...great prices...great view. Pool for some cooling down also. And there is a qaint little beach just adjacent if you feel like it. People are snorkelling in the surf also. Good value for money for sure.
title: Breakfast

text: staff are friendly, helpfull, and they care about what we need during stay here. enjoy the swimming pool has view direct to the sea was amazing. highly recomended, we'll be back for enjoy a home far away from home...cheerss
title: Friendly Staff,

text: Although I wasn't totally impressed with Candidasa in general, Pondok Bambu was a great hotel. They have a lovely pool area right on the water and the food was great. The room was spacious with a very big bathroom. If someone is looking to stay in Candidasa then I would definitely recommend this hotel.
title: Great location in Candidasa

text:
We stayed at this resort as part of our tour of Bali
Was happy with the individual villa style accommodations 
The room was spacious and clean
The sitting area in front was awesome 
The restaurant served great food
It was nice seeing the sunrise at breakfast
Staff was friendly 
Will recommend this resort ✌️👍👌👏👏👏
title: Awesome

text: Old yes ..But not aged , a typical Bali hotel , any closer to the water and we would be swimming . Rooms a great size great bathroom. Plenty of staff who would be on for a conversation or melt into the background if they sensed you wanted to be left alone . Great breakfast (limited but enough) great restaurant.. All  round great value ..recommend ...definitely
title: Stunning

text:
Granted we have only been here for a day so far but we are so enchanted we had to tell the world about the incredible Pondok Bambu in Candidasa.

From the minute we found the resort on trip advisor we have had the most excellent customer service to answer all our queries and an exceptional response time. We chose this resort purely on that basis even thought we thought we might like other places more. Wayan was so helpful it made our decision for us. 

We were picked up in Seminyak and after two weeks there, this is a welcome reminder of how beautiful Bali really is. The beachfront resort is stunningly beautiful with not a scrap of rubbish or debris. We have been welcomed like family and the children as delighted by the baby elephant that shoots water into the pool. They love him already.

Our room was wonderfully cold for our arrival with an immaculate bathroom not often expected at such a good price point for our room. It is peaceful, quiet and surrounded by lush foliage that the children can explore. 

The beachfront restaurant serves excellent FRESH(!) cuisine - we tried European and Indo and both are great. A margarita pizza covered in ripe tomatoes, where does one find hat in Bali for 65000rp! Well priced and good value for a family staying. 

We are immediately relaxed by the sounds of the waves, the gentle music and the sea breeze acting around as we eat. Already we wish we had stayed here before. We could be anywhere in the world it's so utterly beautiful. 

This resort is for people who enjoy a European lifestlyle. There is no place for ugly behaviour here and our children have been warned to behave at their best. It is for people who want to relax and enjoy the quiet beauty of Bali. The food and service are outstanding so far. 

We are so glad and blessed to be here and can't wait to share with you our stay.
title: Paradise found

text:
I found this place to be average. It is certainly not bad but it is nothing special either. Room is simple, but clean. Both aircon and fan in the room - good. 

Very nice sea view and swimming pool. 

Staff are mostly friendly and helpful. For Breakfast you have to choose between american style, continental or indonesian. It is not bad though. Hovewer I found a person serving breakfast not friendly. But everyone else was nice. 

There is a restaurant as well, but food is nothing special and I would recommend eating elsewhere. 

Wifi is quite poor and every time you get disconnected you have to log in again which is quite annoying. Also it works well in the restautant but signal in the room was not very strong. There were a lot of electicity blackouts during our stay (I know quite common thing in Bali). 

What bothered me was the fact that on many occasions I felt harrased by people trying to offer me either snorcheling or a massage while I was by the pool but once when I was sitting on the terrace in front of my room.
title: Average stay

text:
Great place to stay in Candidasa ,they have a great swimming pool and restaurant located right on waterfront .
Rooms are of a good standard for the money,
Walk out the front to main road and you'll find restaurants ,supermarket ,money changer ,atm, and a variety of shops all within easy walking distance
We will return to Pondok Bambu it's great
title: Location

text: Over many visits here the accomodation,grounds,pool,restaurant and staff have been excellent.Central position on the waters edge it's a great place to veg out.Plenty of loungers.Open air restaurant offers good food/ drinks at an ok price.Pondok divers on site.Nice sunsets for photos.Small hotel,just 13 rooms.....11 and 12 being the pick as they overlook the pool/ ocean.Good free wi fi.
title: Constantly good

text:
I stayed several time on this beautifull hidding place from the crowd. When you enter the resort the silence will overwelm you. And then offcourse the sea view is one I have never seen before. It is a great Balinese resort and I will visit the resort again for my PADI open water. Because you can also dive there.

With warm regards,

Ruud
title: Great place to hide from the crowd

text:
Local dive masters who were a pleasure to dive with, and hire equipment in great condition. Dive boat ready at the door and local dive sites only minutes away. Staff happy to do roadtrips and all very experienced. - recommend diving with these boys.
Accommodation was clean and in good condition, and the staff very friendly and helpful
title: Great local dive service

text:
We recently had our first visit to Candidasa as part of a group of 12 friends and stayed 6 nights.  
What a lovely little resort - only 12 bungalows/rooms and situated right on the beach overlooking the ocean.
The open air restaurant served a substantial breakfast each morning and the lunch and dinner meals were also very good.  All the staff were very friendly and always smiling.
The pool was a reasonable size and there were enough sun beds for everyone.
The rooms were big and clean and the air conditioning worked well but I would ask for a room further down the back so that the noise from the busy road was not so apparent.
We would certainly stay here again.
title: Great little hideaway !!

text: Lovely Balinese resort with spacious rooms good restaurant and a stunning view over the ocean. The staff is very friendly and its clean thats the most important thing. I come here for years and everytime its great. I will put some photo's so you can see it yourself.
title: Lovely Balinese resort

text: I really loved this hotel.  The bungalows were set in rainforest type of gardens so were always cool.  You could sit outside your room on soft chairs provided and it was lovely to look out at all the greenery.  Our room was good, we had trouble with the aircon for a couple of days but the staff went out of their way to fix it and in the end replaced the outside unit and it was then beautifully cool.  The shower was large but a little slippery and I wore thongs and it was great. The pool was lovely and easy to get in and out of and the steps not slippery.  Not too cold either.  I hope to be able to return next year.
title: Beautiful setting

text: We did not stay here but called in for lunch on our way back to Sanur. Beautiful setting right on the water for lunch. We were able to have a quick look at the rooms and they looked very nice. Would like to stay here on a future visit
title: Lovely restaurant

text: We didn't stay at this resort, but it looked very nice. We had a nice lunch and a dinner in the restaurant which overlooks the ocean. Better view during the day as it is very black at night. They do offer a free shuttle to/from your hotel.
title: Great restaurant for breakfast or lunch

text: Go here if you want nice simpel clean accomondation with a lot of athmosphere.   Nice pool and fab sea view.  😆😆😆Ok food but the is poor 😕 nice sunbeds and a lot of places with shadow.  Super friendly staff.
title: Value for money

text: Of toy want a relaxing place to unwind then this is it.  Located on the main road and you don't hear any traffic nose from the rooms or the dining and pool area.  Clean rooms and air con works.  Great friendly service
title: Beautiful views and great service

text:

In the nice restaurant you can order anything without being afraid to be ill because everything that comes out of the very clean kitchen is save. and....very tasty! The best soto ayam of the island. 
The ocean view in the restaurant is wonderful. 
Thanks!,,,,

Ans Sluman.

text:
Nice breeze and relaxt atmosphere and good food.

Soto ayam but also the European food is good. Sometimes we the dolphins passing by. The rooms are clean and spacious and not expensive.  So give it a try. See you soon again. I think tomorrow lol ;-)

text: Pondok has remained constant for a good number of years.Quality accomodation ,especially rooms 11 and 12,Great ocean views,good pool with plenty of sun lounges ,openair restaurant with a fair menu list.Excellent staff,lovely grounds ,centre of town.Good sunset pics.Free parking.Pondok divers office on site.Payment with credit card is 3% extra.Close to cafes,ATM,supermarts,beauty parlours and gift shops.

text: Nice ocean view, sun setting and a sea breeze makes a nice ambience for an evening meal. The usual Bali menu presented, with nice curries to chose from. Book your complimentary transport to and fro. My tip; try the black rice pudding, it's a winner.
title: Little Gem

text:
Central location, fabulous staff, and a great restaurant.
Accommodation was good, clean and adequate.
Would certainly recommend this hotel to my friends.
If you are looking for a snorkling, dive holiday. Then you have found it here....
title: Perfect dive hotel

text: We where there for three nights. The rooms are big, clean and the beds are comfy! I lived in room number 2, the AC was noisy! I would recommend white sand beach 15 minutes drive from the hotel. At Candidasa there is no beach.
title: Nice stay

text: The rooms are very clean, comfortable and roomy.  The washrooms are huge with great shower pressure.  Staff is very attentive, friendly and will help you attain anything you need during your stay.  They even have a scuba diving school!
title: Spectacular Affordable Hotel

text:
The room was always nice and clean and appears to have been recently decorated as it showed no signs of shabbiness at all.  I had one of the sea view rooms and could lie in bed listening to the waves at night.  

Food was excellent on the few occasions I used the restaurant, and the staff always greeted me with big smiles.  Extremely helpful staff when wanting a motorbike or taxi etc.  

Very pleased.
title: Pleasant stay, nice and clean.

text:
We only had a day trip to Candi Dasa this year, but we had to visit the Pondok's bar for a mid-morning refreshment. We have stayed here twice before and the place doesn't seem to have deteriorated at all - it still seems like the place to stay in CD. The view from the bar was terrific, the drinks promptly served and very cold, and we were totally refreshed when we left.
It was good to see the poor old elephant's trunk had been repaired, well done, he's one of the icons about the place!!!
title: Great Seaviews.

text: Rooms are clean and staff are friendly are the only really positives I can say. The hotel is disappointing in that there is no grassy area, no beach, it's on a busy road. The rooms are dated, and the hotel is dated. I would say about 2 stars. Candidasa itself was a dissapointment to us. There is no beach since it was washed away in the 80's. If you want a beach go to White Sands beach 15 minutes North.
title: Rooms are clean and staff are friendly but dated accomodation

text:
This was my first trip to Bali and I had heard basic reviews of the place initially. To be frank I booked only the first three days of my ten day vacation at Pondok Bambu as I was unsure of what to expect. 

When I first walked in I amazed as the entire place was overlooking the sea.Beautiful well maintained gardens complimented the view. The rooms and the bathroom were well ventilated and clean. Our room rate included breakfast and there was a wonderful variety to choose from, both local and international. 

In addition, we also tried the cooking course with the in-house chef and we were amazed at the number of fresh spices and herbs that went into cooking a basic dish. I was a bit apprehensive of sending my laundry out as I heard horror stories in Bali of clothes returned in different shapes and sizes, but after the first lot was returned I was happy with the service.

During the day, we did explore the tourist attractions, such as elephant riding, visiting the water gardens, temples etc, all of which were a decent 45 minutes drive in a car. There were even a few local beaches we visited by boat which was a 30 minute ride.

I did manage to sneak in a few sessions at one of the nearby beauty parlours, the Watergarden parlour which was a 5 minute walk and they provided an excellent service for the price, but you did have to book in advance.

For dinner, we normally stepped out to Crazy Kangaroo, which by the way made amazing drinks, their Arrack Attack is one to reckon with! The food was good and in addition they had the local artists performing once week. There were many options to eat out in the area so you would never get bored of dining out!

The hotel is situated away from the crowds so if you are looking for a peaceful and quiet place, this would be a good option to explore.

P.S. I did end up staying the entire 10 days as the place was amazing and I could not find a reason to move out.
title: Quiet , Cozy and Laidback

photos.caption: Swimming Area in front of the Hotel

text:
Pondok bambu is one of the place thay you feel like coming home. The staff are very friendly and i love the place its great.good is good so good and 1 plus no extra fees about 15 till 21 procent extra
 And you also can play pool on the pooltable when you finished your meal its very good overhere :)
title: Always a home koming for me

text: This place is absolutely beautiful. Staff are amazing, the scuba instructor took the time out to give our 6 year old a little lesson in the pool as he was desperate to dive but not old enough.The location is superb overlooking the ocean. Rooms are spacious and comfortable, clean and have a nice front balcony.
title: Grandparents revelling with 6 year old grandchild

text: We just got back from our second holiday to Bali and again stayed at Pondok Bambu. The staff are so friendly, the rooms are comfortable and clean, the kids and I absolutely love the pool and the food is delicious. Can't go wrong!
title: Another great escape to Pondok Bambu in Candidasa, Bali

text:
We Stayed at Pondok Bambu with the whole family for 10 days!!
The service was awesome, staff are amazing and the food to die for! 
If we could recommend a place to anyone Pondok Bambu would most certainly be it and a bit! Would not stay anywhere else!!!
title: What a place, what a holiday!!

text: Nice retreat in the East of Bali. Great staff and very friendly. The rooms are good but a little dark. The front is a green corridor of plants but at the end an very nice view on the sea and a good open space for dining and swimming. Good Value in a nice quiet part of Bali
title: Hidden place in the East

text:
The best part is the convenient location and rocky beachfront.  
Hotel as clean and secure with in-room safe.
Rooms and bathrooms are good-sized but hot water is not there.  
They only have double-bed rooms for two and to get an extra portable bed adds 50% to the price.  (This information is not available on booking.com.)
Hotel restaurant is nice, good prices and food in local restaurants.
title: A convenient, comfortable beachfront location.

owner_response.text:
Dear OregonTravelinFamily,
Thank you for your review. We always try our best to use your review to approve ourselves.
You wrote; "They only have double-bed rooms for two and to get an extra portable bed adds 50% to the price". I do not agree with this comment because we only charge US$15,- for a extra bed. 
Please can you send us a private email with the name on the invoice and the date you have stayed with us, we can see in our accounting if 50% is charged for the extra bed, we will send the money back if we find our mistake. Thank you again for your review.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We chanced upon this place from a guide book and indeed it is a very nice place. I was especially happy with the food they served and the portion is amazing. My personal favorite was the chicken cordon bleu. It was tasty and the portion isn't for those who eat little. The one thing that frowned me slightly was the eatery doesn't have any fans. So you can imagine it can get quite hot and stuffy whilst trying to enjoy your meals or drinks. No doubt it's just by the sea, still the unpredictable sea breeze can be a slight discomfort. Other than that, I would really recommend this place to everyone.
title: Good Food

text:
I love Candidasa! I chose this hotel because it was in an area I was familiar with, and felt comfortable leaving my 15 year old son in while I SCUBA dived.
Upon check in, where a welcome drink was supplied, I asked if the room was 2 seperate beds, it wasn't! No worries, they moved us to another with a king bed and a single! I love a hard mattress and got one here! Great room, upstairs, massive bathroom with good pressure shower and no problems with hot water. AC was perfect. breakfast was basic, but good.
Coffee and tea making facilities included. 
My son informed me that room service was pretty cool, while I was diving.
Beautiful gardens and I loved the pool!  
My only problem with this hotel is in regard to diving...  This hotel markets itself as a diving hotel, and I did indeed see a few clients utilising the resorts diving program; however I dive with another company when in Candidasa... I felt like I was a little not welcomed because of this...(small Problem)
Directly across the road is "Crazy Kangaroo" restaurant, love it!
title: Not bad at all...

text:
We enjoyed our 6 days in Pondok Bambu early January 2015. This was during low season so it was not very busy in Candidasa.

Bambu is a small but very nice resort. We stayed in a garden view cottage which was spacious and clean and everything worked as expected.
The breakfast is simple but good and the same goes for the lunch (which was included in our diving package). When you eat a la carte (lunch or dinner) you have a lot more to choose from.
The restaurant has excellent sea view and good service.

There is a small pool where you can cool down. The beach is not much more than rocks so you are probably relaxing on the lounge beds in the resort. There is a small 'harbour' where you can swim and snorkel in a protected area.

We were there for the diving which we did with Bambu divers, situated in the resort. This turned out to be very convenient....... no transfers, just a 1 minute walk from diving to the room. For the divers they have some real interesting packages which bring good value for money.  I will comment more on the diving in my review of Bambu Divers.

Other services like airport transfers and early breakfast are all well arranged. The people are very flexible and will try to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

Candidasa is a place with a lot of small resorts and hotels. This also means that you have a good choice of restaurants and bars. One of the best restaurants is Kanguru, just across the street from Bambu.
title: Great place for divers

text:
Stayed at Pondok Bambu for 3 nights and enjoyed every minute of it. Great room at the pool and ocean, loved the food and the hospitality and friendliness of all staff. The location is also great, in the middle of Candidasa close to many restaurants. There also is an inhouse diving school, Bambu divers. We will be back. 

Rudie
title: fantastic relaxing place to be.

text:
After a stressful experience in another part of Bali, we decided to go to Candidasa in the hope that Pondok Bambu would have a room free.
We stayed there 5 years ago and remembered what a wonderful place this was.
Luckily they had a room and it is still just as good as we remembered. 
Nice big comfortable rooms with a great veranda. 
Good restaurant and pool and lovely staff. 
It is really restful just to sit by the restaurant on the patio overlooking the sea.
title: peaceful hideaway

text: Been a year since our last visit.Way too long.Greeted by staff members that have known us forever, by name, is great, in a non ego way.Same faboulous service, on and on I could go.Just love this place.This trip we had with us our 14 year old daughter, first asian trip. Wow, thats all she said.Same room,12, ocean n pool fronting.Heaven.See my previous posts regards this place.Wont dissapoint.Food n drinks are at a good price and quality.
title: visit number 15

text: We stayed here for 11 nights and we stayed here last year also. We love this hotel we always stay in a Seaview room which overlooks the pool. This is a huge room with a huge bathroom we just love it. It is an oceanfront hotel not beach front. Once again we found the choice at breakfast was adequate & have no complaints. It is such a peaceful hotel with only 13 rooms & the staff are lovely. It is in the middle of Candidasa & an easy walk to many restaurants. Bambu  restaurant serves excellent meals but this year they charged to use our credit card so we went out more often to restaurants who don't do that. Our room was cleaned every day with fresh towels everyday even though we could have gone a few days without replacing them. Our bathroom has a shower & no bath which means I didn't have to climb in. We visited a number of hotels either side of Ponduk Bambu but thought Ponduk was by far the best and we will definitely stay here again.
title: Best Hotel in Candidasa for the Price

text:
We had been looking forward to returning to the Pondok Bambu for a five night stay and we were certainly not disappointed.  We actually stayed during Nyepi (Balinese New Year where the whole island shuts down for 24 hours) and were happy that I was able to keep the children happy and entertained here on a day when they can not leave the premises.  I am also very grateful to the gentleman who runs the dive operations from the Pondok Bambu for his patience, advice and eagerness to assist my 8 year old son with setting up his fishing rod so he could fish off the balcony at the hotel (water comes right up to the hotel wall).  

We stayed in room 1, closest to the road and had no issue with traffic noise at all.  We stayed in this room on our previous visit as well and appreciated that the second bedroom now has two single beds in it were previously it had a double bed in it.

The set up at breakfast has changed since our last visit but is still adequate particularly when it is included in the room cost.

We have not found fault with this hotel and will continue to say there.  It is not perfect in every way but it is a reasonably priced hotel and we noticed some improvements from our previous stay.  As it is a smaller hotel, the staff are all pay you a lot of attention which really adds to making your stay special.  Rather intimate really.  It is also in a great central location in Candidasa so the need for transport is dramatically reduced.  Looking forward to our next visit!
title: Return trip, did not let us down.

photos.caption: This is how you do it mate!  Tying so kind of fishing knot

text: We only stayed here for 1 night, which was actually to short because the hotel is located next to the sea, the staff is very friendly and helpful and the food is great. It was great to enjoy breakfast next to the sea and enjoy the sound of the waves. We definitely will come back, but then for a longer time.
title: Great food, great location, great staff

text:
Just loved the location of Pondok Bambu, staff were very friendly and accommodating, food was great and there are many restaurants within walking distance of PB, everything is so close at hand..... massages were also heaven by the pool/ocean
Rooms were very clean and serviced daily with clean towels and bed linen.. we stayed in room 4 and noise was never a factor...
I can't really think of anything negative about my 10 day stay at Pondok Bambu.. just a lovely little slice of paradise and a gorgeous view of the ocean to wake up to every morning....
title: Slice of Bali Paradise

text: Fantastic place beautiful with many trees and shrubs, great location sea views and small pool. Beach access staff are lovely food is really good. A lovely lady called Kermang came round and did the best massage.
title: Holiday

text:
Just back after our 4th stay at Pondok Bambu and it definitely didn't disappoint.

rooms are nice and big and clean, staff ever so friendly and the pool is to die for all overlooking great ocean views. We will definitely be back again next year.
title: Great Place - Very Friendly and helpful Staff

owner_response.text: thank you very much for your review hope to see you again and again.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Been several times to this hotel in Candidasa.
Every time had a great stay. 
The rooms are very nice and complete, house keeping is excellent, crew is very friendly and will help you with everything.
Breakfast is bulky, whatever you want. When you want something and it isn't there, they will try their up-most to have it arranged the next day. Restaurant is overlooking the ocean.
In-house dive company (English language is outstanding), which are famous about their dive locations. For me Pondok Bambu divers are the number one in the area.
Local knowledge is very good and they will help you plan your days, only if you want them to. They know the special places in the area and also other area's.
Beautiful garden, peaceful environment, quiet. It is in a central location of the city on walking distances of other restaurants, warungs, banks, etc
One thing I didn't like at one of the earlier bookings: I found out it was fully booked and had to look for a different hotel(which was also good, but not as Pondok Bambu). People are going home after the holiday and immediately book(while they are still in the hotel) the holiday for the next year.
Looking forward to our next stay.
title: Pondok Bambu, my favourite place to be.

owner_response.text: thanks Michiel see you next time and book direct on pondokbambu@live.com and we give you 10% discount.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
It’s a favourite lunch spot for us in Candidasa and we always take a towel as the pool is so lovely!
You walk in from the busy main street and feel instantly cooled by the shady, leafy walkway.
You are always welcomed here whenever you show up and the food is always good and very inexpensive.
My favourite? The Soto Ayam and chocolate ice cream sundae.
title: Well priced. Good service. Lovely visits. Thank you!

text: I stayed here on a group trip with Wacky Jacky. I loved the hotel, the staff were friendly and helpful. The restaurant was good.  Lovely breakfast over looking the ocean or dinner watching the sun set. Easy walking from here to anywhere in Candidasa.
title: Friendly Hotel

text:
I've popped in here a few times usually just for a beer or juice overlooking the sea. This time though I came for lunch and I was delighted.

I had pork in a garlic and caper sauce. It was served with good mash. Very nice all round.

Prices are fair bearing in mind that a lot on the menu is imported. There are some Dutch speciality snacks as well which makes a nice change and addition to the menu. It is quite a long menu too which is great.

I'd recommend this place 100%.
title: Nice food, nice setting

text: We decided to try this Hotel based on recent reviews and weren’t disappointed. Beautiful waterfront outlook over the ocean from the Restaurant and Pool area. Lovely staff, great breakfast as part of our package and some superb alternative places to eat within walking distance, from great value Warungs to expensive (for Bali) restaurants. We dined at several and didn’t have a bad meal. There is a little local supermarket 150 metres down the road for most of your needs at good local prices. All in all, a great place for a peaceful break in Candidasa.
title: How’s the Serenity

text: Stayed for a week in room 5, the location was fantastic, next to the sea with access to a small beach and boat mooring area, the pool and sun loungers overlook the sea with a welcome breeze and sound of waves and the restaurant serves some great food also with the same view. The room was neat and tidy with a small verandah overlooking the garden. All the staff at the hotel were first rate, hard working and really pleasant.  Bad points, none that we found during our stay. There is an on site dive centre attached to the hotel, this again is excellent, with knowledgeable guides and good equipment.
title: Great Location, Great Staff

text:
This really is a joy to come to. The entrance does not do it justice.

First the reception, then the Dive Centre and then the gardens leading to the restaurant, pool and terrace over looking the sea.

A wonderful place. Nice staff, great food. I will return for sure.
title: Great location, friendly staff, nice food

text:
Its a Nice small resort with I think 12 bungalows. No noice from the busy road in the front.good food ,staff  friendly ,cold drinks,Nice swimmingpool directly on the ocean And the rooms are very clean.
Will return end of this year again for 4 weeks.
title: Perfect Balinese resort

text:
I've been diving there one year ago. It was great!
This year I also had the room there. Just amazing! The Divecenter and the boat to dive with is within less than a minute walk within the area. 
The rooms are great, diving there is the best and the staff is very helpful and friendly. 
I booked for 4 nights and stayed 6.
I'd go back there immediately!
title: Best place to stay and dive

text:
I made a video so you can see for yourself what you think about Pondok Bambu. The entrance, the room, bathroom, the view from the room, the terrace, the garden, the swimming pool, the restaurant, the sea view, the beach and the diving center are all in the video. 

You can find the video on YouTube if you look for: 'Pondok Bambu Candidasa Bali'. My YouTube account is called: Brilliant Dutch Guys. It took me ten minutes to film everything. I made shortcuts in the movie so you can look up the different area's fast if you don't want to see everything. Just press the times that belong to the thing you want to see in the description below the movie.

My opinion: if you like relaxation, a paradise view and garden, good food and maybe want to go diving this is the place to be. The room and bathroom where not clean at all but the manager responded to my YouTube video that this is improved now.
title: Paradise views, amazing garden, pool and food except breakfast, a professional diving club and poor cleaning

text:
Great room views of pool and sea, large bathroom.
Only complaints would be the bath towels a little on the old side.
Glasses and coffee cups not cleaned or replaced each day.
Staff need a little more training in the restaurant, always have to ask for salt/
pepper. Orders never quite right at breakfast, due to lack of understanding.
title: Great

text:
I've been staying here for over 10 years,at least once a year.got married here in traditional Balinese dress.always stay in the sea view rooms,there are 2,
Great staff,lots have been here since I have been coming,great views,great.....well everything.
There is a dive centre on site and close to everything.
Looking for a top spot for relaxation......here it is.
About 2 hours from Denpasar but worth it
title: My paradise

text: What an adorable property Pondok Bambu is. My 12yrold daughter and I stayed for 4 nights in one of the seaview rooms. It was recommended to me by a friend who stays there. We absolutely loved it. Gorgeous ocean frontage, smack bang in the middle of CD. Very very clean rooms, sheets, towels and all facilities. Restaurants food was very nice. I took a peek in one of the gardenview rooms and I would have no problems with them either. The pool was crystal clear and clean BUT the elephant fountain needs to go..haha. I have an aversion to pool water I cant walk straight into, needs to not be chilly, (I know..crazy) anyway on arrival I felt the water and it was perfect, to me, but then they turned the elephant on and an hour later the water was freezing (to me).. Honestly, with this little property you cant go wrong!! We cant wait to return later this year.
title: Gorgeous Gem

text: I've stayed here with my 2 young children for 6 day's during our month holiday on Bali. Our bungalow was very nice, clean and had a big bathroom and teras in front of the room. The staff was pleasant en helpfull. All the bungalows are build around a nice garden and the teras has a gorgious view over the sea. A nice swimmingpool and they also have a great diving school. Breakfast lunch and diner here is good as well. Great place, great fun and good memory's
title: Magnificent

text: I got picked up from the airport, my scooter was waiting on arrival and they provided a great variety of day trips around Bali. Beautiful resort, Great kitchen, excellent service. Beautiful views and close to some of the best Bali has to offer.
title: Mr. Klarenbeek

text:
After staying at Pondok Bambu 4 times and receiving consistant service and quality, its time to write a review.

During each stay I found the rooms, restaurant & grounds to be clean, well kept, up to date & relaxing.

The rooms are spacious, with modern fittings, including television with a good selection of stations, fridge, air conditioner, comfortable beds, clean white sheets, hot water, are private with open air space between bungalows and are set with smart looking decor.

The grounds are very well kept & include a restaurant, nice sized pool, sun lounges, as well as tables away from the main hotel which provide an excellent view of the ocean (a great place for a beer).

The staff were courteous, well presented & always busy either with the upkeep of the property or tending to the needs of guests.

Pondok Bambu is located just before the heart of Candidasa, and is directly opposite the Crazy Kangaroo restaurant which offeres an excellent meal prepared with the confidence of a glass wall kitchen (you can see directly into the kitchen), as well as entertainment ranging from a live DJ to traditional Balinese Dancers.

Also attached to Pondok Bambu Bungalows is Bambu Divers, which is a professionally run Scuba Diving School which caters to the beginner student all the way through to the highly experienced diver wanting to dive the beautiful and interesting local dive sites.

I clearly have no hesitation in suggesting a stay Pondok Bambu Bungalows, whether it be over night, a weekend or a week, the staff will take good care of your needs.
title: A good balance of accommodation, food, activity

text:
Our 2 night stay in Pondok Bambu was ok.
Room was clean, had air condition and a safety deposit box. Only problem we had was with the shower, you got 10 seconds burning hot water and then ice cold water for a minute... Food at the restaurant was really nice and good!
title: Nothing special

text: We stayed at this hotel for 10 days in August 13. I chose this hotel because there were some good reviews on Trip Advisor. We loved this hotel which has only 13 rooms and as recommended on Trip Advisor, we booked a Seaview Room which was huge, with a huge bathroom and a lovely verandah at the front.  The room has an in room safe which is very convenient. We were right in front of the pool, which I thought might be a bit noisy at night but didn’t have to worry because no one was swimming at night. We were about a 2 seconds walk across to the restaurant and after trying a number of Restaurants out on the street, found the hotel Restaurant to have the best food at the best prices. It was so relaxing sitting looking out at the ocean every time we had our breakfast and evening meal there, especially when their was a good sunset. Their BBQ Pork ribs were the best I have ever had even in Sydney. You can’t walk out onto a beach from the pool area, you have to walk down some stairs to get to the ocean and the local boats, but the view out each day was wonderful. Some nights the tankers that were coming into the refinery were all lit up and it was like a fairyland. Breakfast was good enough, one could choose from 4 options and was cooked fresh everyday, no buffet. Their French fries were great for a snack during the day, really crunchy. The pool was small but if all you want to do is lie around the pool reading and just want to cool off every now and again it was enough for us. The hotel staff was lovely. This hotel offered Deep Sea diving so a lot of the guests just stayed for this reason. We thought this was a real gem and plan to come back again, have already chosen a driver who would pick us up from the airport. We would probably stay longer than the 10 days. We went on a local boat up to the White Sandy beach, which was hilarious as we got drenched all the way, but had a nice day lying on the sun beds there and having lunch at the beachside cafes. This is not a 5 star hotel but we loved it. We loved Candidasa, quiet and friendly. This is not the place to stay if you want lots of action and nightlife you need to stay closer to Kuta, but we have done that plenty of times and enjoyed the change. We were still able to do some shopping at the local markets across the road and it felt good helping them out by buying some of their clothing. The local women would come around the pool and offer massages for 70,000 RP, what a bargain and they were very good and worked for an hour. I recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a quiet holiday.
title: A Great Little Hotel

photos.caption: Our Seaview room, very spacious with inroom safe
Looking across pool to our Seaview room
Verandah in front of Seaview room
Looking at Pool from our room
Huge Bathroom with open shower but the room is so big clothes don't get wet

text:
We reserved this accommodation based on web-reviews and were not disappointed.

This is a truly hidden gem for anyone who seeks nature, good food, sea and diving/snorkelling. Good base for exploring East-Bali.

It was very peaceful, quiet and relaxed, and we loved the staff and the food. Around this place you find ATM's, supermarkets and restaurants. Try the famous Crazy Kangaroo which has often live music or traditional dance.
title: This is a truly hidden gem for anyone who seeks nature, good food, seaview and diving/snorkelling.

photos.caption: Pondok Bambu seen from the water

text:
We stayed here last year and decided to revisit this year. We weren't disappointed.
We booked the same poolside room and found it had been upgraded. As far as we were concerned, it was great as it was - but with the upgrade it was even better (and the same price!!).
The manicured gardens were still as beautiful as ever, and not a leaf out of place. It really was a delight to walk to our room. The restaurant food was delicious and reasonably priced, and the service was friendly and efficient (without "hovering near you......waiting"), and all the hotel staff were there to help and assist.
This is one of the nicest hotels we have visited.
title: Another Great Stay Here

text:
We stayed in pondok bambu a few times already. really enjoyed each time, very relaxing, great room for the price, nice restaurant with the best view, great place to watch the sunset, friendly staff.
I did my open water course with the dive centre--bambu divers. The instructors were excellent, really enjoyed my very first time diving experience, all brand new equipment, good size dive boat that is moored in front of the hotel, easy access to all dive sites.
My husband and I really really enjoyed our recent stay, thanks to Hans, Gerard, Harald, and Putu from Bambu Divers team.
We will be back soon ! ;)
title: Love It !

text:
We stayed here for 3 nights after 4 nights in Saren Indah, Ubud. Although not close to matching Saren Indah's service standards, Pondok Bambu is pretty nice with newly renovated rooms and pretty good breakfast and restaurant (no buffet though).

There's not much to do around though other than sitting on their porch and looking at the sea. There's no beach beyond the hotel to walk - you need to go to either Pasir Putih (White Sand Beach, 150,000 IDR taxi round-trip) or the Gwolava (Black Sand Beach near Padangbai) to experience a real beach. Its good for snorkeling and diving outings though.
title: Pretty decent hotel

text:
We have visited Pondok Bambu several times and by the first time we were struck by the friendliness of the place. Exellent hospitality. It is a relaxed closeness in this resort that makes you feel at home. 
It has now got an inhouse dive center (Bambu Divers Candidasa), with their own instructor and diving boat, so it is a really easy way to both relax and go on divingtrips. The pool fits both for little kids and for diving trainees.
The seaview is soothing for stressed people, the food is good, the health drink menu is astonishing
title: Bali smile

text: Our biggest problem with the Pondok Bambu is that we were not there long enough.  The lovely laid back atmosphere of the hotel and Candidasa itself, saw my family at it's happiest.  We were in the family room (Rm 1) and even though it is the closest room to the road we really didn't have too much traffic noise.  The bathroom was modern and very clean and we loved sitting out on our porch in the evenings.  The beds were comfortable (although a little squeaky iykwim) and all the room facilities were in perfect working order.  We found the staff to be very laid back and helpful when needed.  This is the place I will return to on my Bali visits.  I love all of Bali but this area is the new love for me.
title: We loved it!

photos.caption: One of my favorite spots for a cocktail
My other favorite spot for a cocktail!

text:
This was our third time staying at Pondok Bambu. The rooms are very comfortable, there's a nice pool and being located right on the ocean is great.
The only minor issue we had was finding bugs in our food from the restaurant on three occasions (out of ten times we ate there). We have never had this issue at this resort before, so we were surprised by this.
Overall, we would still recommend staying here and we will be back again.
title: Well worth considering...

text: Handy to varied village shopping with a gorgeous pool and an outlook that,with a cool glass, music and sunset, had me thinking I'd found heaven!Lovely spacious villas with modern bathrooms and helpful staff. Would happily recommend this accommodation though not for dinner. Great in room massage by a magical masseuse was arranged on request.
title: Good find.

text: We stayed in the seaview room, nice. The pool was excellent, as was the food. Staff were great, made early cups of Nescafe for us!!! The beds were very comfortable. The shower had very little pressure.
title: Relaxing.

text:
We stayed in a garden view room close to the pool as the seaview rooms where booked, the room was very comfortable and super clean, water pressure was great, aircon worked a treat and tv had some english channels.
Breakfast was delicious and staff where so friendly and helpful.
I was dissapointed we had only booked 2 nights here as I found it so relaxing, gorgeous loungers around the pool, views of the ocean to die for, a tiny little beach that was fine for swimming.
I highly recommend for anyone wanting to get away from it all.
For $50au a night for 3 of us including breakfast it is an absolute bargain!!
title: My new favourite place in Bali

text: The entrance belies the gemvthat is hidden inside quaint modern bungalows  water features views to die for wonderful food and friendly staff a true great value getaway  give Kuta and Seminyak  the swerve and enjoy the real BALI  as it used to be explore Candidasa
title: Never judge a book by its cover

text: We stayed at Pondok Bambu in the Family room and loved it. This room is located at the front near the road so there was noise from the traffic but it wasnt a issue for us nor our children (1yrs,3yrs,11yrs).When we arrived we found the aircon. wasnt working well and this was fixed promptly. We found all the staff to be very friendly and professional. The pool was perfect for small children with its shallow area and the big one had fun in the deeper one. Having the beach right there is also fantastic as you can access this and swim/snorkel and the little ones can swim/explore.The breakfast was also great. We would stay again.
title: Great Value

text: I registered for everyone, who's look for a familiar hotel. The hotel is beautiful, crews very lovely. We styed here two weeks, enjoyed all moments! Highly recommandable for everybody who wants a good value holiday on Bali!
title: Familiar, lovely hotel

text: We had a great time with our family. Great service and nice people. Is was the best holiday we ever had and the Indonesian food was dellicious. everything was nice and clean. Next year we'll come back!

user_location.name: Alphen aan de Rijn, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands

title: Great Time In Pondok Bambu Seaside Bungalows

text:
We had a realy good time in pondok bambu , realy relaxed atmosphere and the view is amazing there!
Friendly staff and helpfull owner. The bungalows are big, clean and cosy.Highly recommandable for everybody who wants a good value holiday on Bali!
title: Excelent stay in candidasa!

text: We stayed here for two times already,in May and August 2012, it's a beautiful place with very nice ocean view. Both times we stayed in the room at the pool so when you wake up you get the amazing oceanview, these are also the best rooms very spacious and clean. The staff is very helpful and friendly. And there is a lot to do and see in the surroundings of the hotel.
title: Fantastic accomodation

text: We ended our Bali journey at this hotel. It is really nice and spacious, beautiful view, really green gardens. However with our 10-day local experience we knew it was too expensive for Bali and the staff did not seem to care about anything but our payment.
title: love this place

text:
I have stayed at this hotel in Candidasa on 2 occasions now and rate it as "good value for money" & a little Balinese-style gem of a mature age. 
$US65 gets you either room 11 or 12, which are the 2 seaview rooms overlooking the pool and Badung Strait, plus a 3 course breakfast.
The bedroom is quite large and the bathroom, even bigger. Our room, number 11, had a roomy queen size 4 poster bed, plus a single bed, plenty of wardrobe and drawer space, a small fridge, good airconditioning, and a fan. Our small outdoor patio had 2 chairs, a small coffee table & a drying rack, plus gorgeous views towards the pool and the sea. At night, we could hear the sea roaring and the waves rolling ashore, nature's musical prelude to a cosy & deep sleep. 
It isn't the most fashionable hotel on the block, but has an ambience and tranquilllity all of it's own laid-back style, and we enjoyed relaxing here very much.
Our room was kept clean, the towels were fine, and the pool was always sparkling.
We did notice the odd ant from time to time, but hey, you are in the tropics.............
Breakfast is certainly more than adequate, with a choice of menu, and on the day that we did the Bali Asli cooking class, the staff happily obliged by cooking us breakfast earlier than the usual 8-11am time-frame. Freshly squeezed fruit juice, nasi goreng & sticky black rice pudding is enough to last you until dinner time!
We have also eaten lighter snack meals here - salad, shrimp cocktail, chips etc - no complaints - but have yet to have a dinner here.
I do hope that this hotel retains it's lovely old world Bali feel for many years to come!
title: Balinese style "Little Gem"

photos.caption: Sticky black rice pudding for breakfast!
A casual lunch under the bale on the day we arrive
Gorgeous sunset views from the back parapet of the hotel

text: Our family of two adults and two children stayed at the Pondok for five nights in a two bedroom bungalow.  The price was 600 000rp including breakfast.  The room was ample and clean but secong bedroom was very small as you can see in photos.  The noise from the road can be a bit loud as you are right next to reception.  The rooms further down back would be quieter. The pool was alaways inviting and the staff were very friendly and willing to help with any request. Breakfast was off the menu with ample to choose from. The view from restuarant was overlooking the ocean. It was in a good location and you are able to walk up and down the streets of Candi Dasa with ease from here. Also a great base to tour surrounding attractions. Would stay again back maybe not in family room as second room was a little to cramped.  Over was a lovely stay.
title: Value for Money

photos.caption: Taken from ocean view room looking over pool

text: we have stayed at pondok many times on our trips to bali and cannot say enough about the beautiful ambience of this quaint resort, from the time you meet miss wayan at reception,( typical bali smiles), to the short garden walk to the outstanding view overlooking the bali sea, we have always been taken in by the beautiful old world bali feel. we really dont like telling people how good this place is in candi dasa as we love the original feel of what bali is all about, with the loving smiles and care of the bali people, to the still natural beauty of the landscape and beaches and hope that it stays this way, far from the maddening resorts plaguing bali at this time. (oops too political maybe) cant help it, candi and east coast still magic and should stay this way. terima kasih.
title: serenity now

text:
This year we went to our usual hotel for a couple of nights stay, but it wasn't available. We made enquiries at the Pondok Bambu, and after seeing the rooms, the dining area, and experiencing the general feel of the place, we knew it was perfect for us. We stayed here this time, and knew we would be staying here every time we go to Candi Dasa in the future. We immediately fell in love with the whole ambience of the place. The location is perfect for strolling up and down the main street, the rooms are large and clean, the beds are comfortable, and the included breakfast is more than enough to start you off for even the most energetic day.
We wish we had found this hotel years ago, as we wouldn't have missed out so much, by staying at our other hotel!!!
title: Fantastic Accommodation.

text:
We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights in march in a garden bungalow. Room was clean and spacious. Nice balcony out front of room.Bed comfortable. Breakfast was cooked to order and sufficent.
Location is good and within walking to many restaurants.
I would have given this 5 stars however the staff did not show the balinese welcome and friendliness you get at other hotels, in particular the receptionist who seemed very disinterested. This may not be important to some but for my husband and I we prefer to stay where you get a friendly face and the huge balineses smile.
title: lacks the balinese friendliness

owner_response.text:
im sorry to hear that.
we talk with all staff and the problem is solved.

regard 

management
pondok bambu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Have been going to this hidden gem since it opened Many years ago. Great little hotel, clean good sized rooms, great helpful staff, great food, restaurant and pool on ocean side with gentle sea breeze and great views.  Recommend this hotel for everyone.
title: Great little hotel.

text:
waking up in the morning go for my breakfast to the restaurant.
breakfast with a good cup of coffee the wind in my hair from the ocean breeze.
restaurant is on the ocean side.
what i need more?
the staff is very friendly.
rooms are clean.
a beautiful garden all around.
next year i come again (third time)
title: perfect!!

text:
Casi una hora de reloj para servirnos la comida y encima encontrarme un Gado Gado sin tofu.. al menos el curry no estaba mal, pero se denota calidad de cocina muy baja.. destacar vistas al mar y servilletas de tela.

Se tiene que pagar en efectivo, no recomendable!
title: Respecto al restaurante..

text:
Super fijn hotel...hele goede service en vriendelijke mensen. Prijs kwaliteit is top.
Kwam dit keer voor de tweede keer het jaar op Pondok voor een korte vakantie, in de omgeving zijn vele leuke dingen te doen en te bezichtigen
title: Overnachten in Candidasa

text: Koselig hotell med nydelig beliggenhet. God mat. Svært trivelig og serviceinnstilt betjening. Godt renhold på rommene, og utearealene blir stelt daglig. Har vært her 4 ganger, alle gangene i minst 2 uker, og er stadig like fornøyd.
title: Ferie

text:
For femte gang er jeg her. Deilig sted like ved havet. Friskt og luftig. 
God mat. Koselig lite basseng. Godt skjermet fra trafikkstøy. Usedvanlig hyggelig betjening. Mange av dem har vært her i mange år. Veldig hyggelig å bli husket. Passe stort. Passer fint for en gruppe venner fordi man kan være både sammen og privat. Svært barnevennlig.
title: Ferietur

text:
Candidasa is een mooi en rustig stukje van Bali. Heerlijk om tot rust te komen en te genieten van wat het echte bali te bieden heeft. Pondok bambu is een mooi hotel met vriendelijk personeel, geweldig leuke eigenaren en super aardige nederlands sprekende duikinstructeuren. De kamers zijn schoon en netjes. Voldoende ruimte ook. Wat ook erg fijn is, is dat je maar hoeft te vragen en er wordt met je mee gedacht/vanalles voor je geregeld. 
Pondok Bambu is de ideale plek om van daar uit verschillende uitstapjes te maken met eend driver (welke voor je geregeld kan worden) of met de scooter. 
Als je naar beneden loopt bij het zwembad heb je bovendien een klein stukje strand. White sand beach is een groter strand met strandtentjes waar je lekker kunt eten/drinken, kunt liggen op bedjes en genieten van een massage. Dit ligt op ongeveer 15 min rijden. Echt een aanrader!
title: Heerlijk thuiskomen

text:
Was een rustige periode wij vonden het heerlijk. 
Goede verzorging en fijn personeel  rustige omgeving nog 2 dagen met chauffeur op pad geweest in de buurt erg mooi heerlijke stranden. 
Hier is echte nog het Balinese leven te vinden . Zoals bij kuta sanur ubud allemaal heel toeristisch .
title: Einde van ons rondreis java Bali nog 9 dagen dit hotel aangedaan.

text: Al jaren komen we in dit hotel, en altijd is het werkelijk geweldig! Wat een heerlijke kamers, prachtige ligging en super personeel. Uitstekende prijs-kwaliteitverhouding, heerlijke keuken, ik kan echt niets negatiefs verzinnen!
title: Hier heb je écht vakantie!!!!

text: Dit hotel is ons vorig jaar zo goed bevallen, dat we nog een keer terug zijn gegaan. Vriendelijk personeel, schoon, rustig en mooie kamers. Het ontbijt, lunch en diner is goed en uitgebreid. Een aanrader voor iedereen die Oost-Bali wil ontdekken. We gaan nog een keer terug, het voelt als 2e huis.
title: Opnieuw naar deze heerlijke plek

text: Het is echt een fantastische plek om heerlijk van je vakantie en rust te genieten. Leuke eigenaar, leuk personeel, heerlijk eten en prachtig uitzicht. Ik ben er al drie keer geweest en als ik weer naar bali ga verblijf ik zeker weer op pondok. Wat hebben we genoten!!!
title: Fantastische plek!!

text:
Wij gaan nu voor het zesde jaar naar Pondok bambu 
Het is een fantastisch hotel 
Personeel heel erg vriendelijk evenals de eigenaar en de manager
Eten is prima veel keus
En een klein resort met mooie kamers waarvan 2 met uitzicht op zee 
Ik ben weer aan het aftellen om er naartoe te gaan 😍
title: Aanrader

text:
Maart 2019 hebben we 2 1/2 week genoten met onze 2 zonen
Een relaxte vakantie
Het ontbijt was heerlijk, keuze genoeg
Kamers schoon
De jongens vermaakte zich prima in het zwembad, of snorkelde in de oceaan achter pondok bambu
Qua lunch staat er ook veel op de kaart
Zowel europees als aziatisch
Wil je tot rust komen, kom dan naar het oosten van bali en geniet van de rust op pondok bambu
Kortom wij hebben er genoten
title: We hebben genoten met ons vieren van een geweldige vakantie op het resort

text:
Mooie rustige locatie direct gelegen aan zee. 
Zéér vriendelijke mensen, alles kan geregeld worden en niets is teveel. 
De kamers zijn superschoon en worden uiteraard dagelijks bijgehouden. 
Het restaurant heeft een uitgebreide kaart met heerlijk eten. 
Als je wilt kan een taxichauffeur ter plaatse met jou een route maken met bezienswaardigheden. 
Hij rijdt je rond en brengt je naar de mooiste plekjes van Bali. 
Er is ook een eigen duikschool aanwezig. 
Hier kun je je brevet halen of als geoefende duiker met gekwalificeerde duikers je duiken maken in een van de mooiste onderwaterwerelden. 
Kortom een echte aanrader. 
Wij komen zeker weer terug. Top.
title: Vakantie

text: 2 Nachten mogen genieten in Pondok Bambu. De kamers zijn groot en schoon, voorzien van een waterkoker, airco, koelkastje en kluisje. Een flinke badkamer en een heerlijk bed. Buiten alles keurig netjes onderhouden en schoon gehouden. Heerlijk zitten over de zee kijkend op het terras en daar ook je ontbijt nuttigen. Zeer lekker en uitgebreid. Een klein zwembad en heel veel ligstoelen. Kortom, zeer de moeite waard om hier te verblijven.
title: Heerlijk!

text:
Wir waren nur eine Nacht vor Ort, haben aber die Zeit dort sehr genossen! 
Die Anlage ist überschaubar, gepflegt und schön angelegt. Der Pool und der Liegebereich mit Blick auf das Meer und Nusa Penida waren toll!
Badetücher gab es für den Pool inklusive.
Die Zimmer sind groß, warmes Wasser und AC. Allerdings könnten die Zimmer ein wenig überholt werden. 
Wir hatten leckere Cocktails, ein leckeres Abendessen in gemütlicher Atmosphäre, und ein Frühstück aus großem Angebot.
Sehr nettes Personal, das ist zwar in Bali keine Seltenheit, aber hier kann man das nochmals besonders hervorheben.
title: Schöne Hotelanlage, Gemütliche Atmosphäre

text: Een heerlijke vakantie gehad. Het is een rustig hotel, waar je lekker relaxed kunt liggen luisteren naar de zee, zwemmen in het zwembad, eten en drinken. De leuke en lieve bediening zorgt goed voor je. Ook is het een goede uitvalshoek voor het ontdekken van Oost-Bali. Wij gaan zeker nog een keer terug.
title: Heerlijk relaxen

text:
Wederom een perfecte vacantie ,al was het door familie omstandigheden van korte duur.
We zijn ontzettend goed opgevangen en geholpen. Gerco , Cheva en Gerard bedankt.
Komen zeker weer terug. We zien jullie volgend jaar.
title: Vakantie 2017

text: Een heerlijke vakantie op een mooi vakantie park met zwembad en en goed restaurant waar je lekker kunt eten .Vriendelijk personeel die niet alleen balinees spreken maar ook Engels . Mooie ruime kamers  de bedden worden iederedag verschoond  uitzicht over zee  het is helemaal geweldig .
title: Voor de rust  naar pondok bambu

text:
객실은 2인이 쓰기에 충분히 넓었습니다.(저는 혼자 방문했습니다.)

1. 객실은 항상 깨끗하였으며, 에어컨만 살짝 틀어놓았다가 끄고, 천장 팬만 돌려도 자는 동안 시원하게 잘 수 있었습니다.

2. 직원들은 모두 친절하였습니다.

3. 아침 조식으로 주는 나시고랭은, 인도네시아 어딜 가도 실패하지 않으나, 여기는 제 입맛에꽤 맞아서, 쓱쓱 다 긁어먹게 되었습니다. 다이빙 후 주는 점심도 뭘 먹어도 맛있었습니다.

4. 다이빙 가이드 2명도 모두 친절하고 신뢰를 주었으며, 다이빙에 불편함이 없도록 챙겨주었습니다.
title: 객실, 숙박 등 만족하고 왔습니다.

text:
Een van de weinig rustig en mooi gelegen terrassen van Candidasa.
Eten en drinken zijn er goed, prijs is goed, zeker gezien de ligging.
Kaart is uitgebreid, ook Hollandse snacks!
Toiletten zijn keurig.
title: Geweldig terras aan de zee

text:
Wij zijn hier binnen gelopen voor een hapje en een drankje. Dit was prima. Mooi uitzicht over de zee. Klein zwembad erbij. Personeel erg vriendelijk. Alles zag er schoon uit. 
Ook heb je geen last van het vele lawaai van de straat. Heerlijk plekje om te relaxen.
title: Prima hapje en drankje gedaan.

text:
Wederom genoten van Pondok Bambu met mooie ligging aan zee. Echt een aanrader om naartoe te gaan bij bezoek aan Candidasa! 
Meerdere keren vertoefd op het terras en bij het fijne zwembad. Heerlijk ontbijt en lunch, uitgebreide keuze in de menukaart, fijne ligstoelen en zeer vriendelijk en service gericht personeel. Mijn vader heeft 2 duiken gemaakt, Manta point en Tulamben, en heeft hier een geweldige ervaring aan overgehouden en zeer van genoten.
title: Fantastisch!

text: Попали сюда благодаря тому,что в отеле который мы изначально выбрали были проблемы с водой.Тут же все прекрасно,напор и температура хорошие,кровать удобная,столик и вода бесплатно! Единственный минус-убила таракана с большой палец,но мне просто на насекомых везет)Бассейн хороший,есть бар с кухней и свой ресторан напротив с народными танцами)Рееомендую этот отель!
title: Хороший отель

text:
Grandioos de crew .Schone huisjes,badkamer schoon, kijk ik altijd als eerste naar. Heerlijk eten aan de oceaan en relaxe.
Je over_naaste buren zie je niet ,vanwege mooie tuin, dat ook goed verzorgd wordt.
Aldus een fijbe vakantie gehad op Pondok Bambu.
Volgend jaar een maand.
title: Geweldig en zo schoon, pluim

text: Bungalow très agréable, restauration de bonne facture et horaire souple , le cadre a couper le souffle, personnel souriant , que demander de plus, situer en centre ville , tous est a proximité, la plage d a cote et plus conviviale que celle de  l hotel
title: Noel a candidasa

text:
Het is heerlijk genieten op Pondok Bambo.
De bediening erg vriendelijk en snel, het eten is perfeck van smaak en goed.
Ook het zwembad is schoon en waterkwaliteit is ook goed.
Er is zelfs een duikersschool aanwezig voor de liefhebbers, heerlijk verblijf en gezellig.
title: Zalig verblijf bij Pondok Bambo

text: We zijn er voor de 3 de keer geweest met kerst en oud en nieuw. Super gezellig vriendelijk personeel schone kamers en heerlijk eten.mooi uitzicht over zee Gaan zeker nog een keer terug.Een echte aanrader als je naar Bali ga
title: Super gezellig en prima eten

text: Het personeel is hier ontzettend lief en ze hebben heerlijk eten. Probeer zeker de verse fruitsappen uit, deze zijn erg lekker! Mooi zwembad en prachtig uitzicht op de zee. Ik zelf ben een vegetariër en hier hebben ze genoeg keus. Ook gerechten met vlees erin kunnen vegetarisch gemaakt worden.
title: Zeker een aanrader!

text:
Preis / Leistungssieger! Die Bungalows sind sehr gemütlich mit einer bequemen Bett, einem super Badezimmer und schöner Dekoration.
Zimmer hat eine Klimaanlage und einen Ventilator.
Das Frühstück ist lecker, frisch auf Bestellung zubereitet und im Zimmerpreis inbegriffen. Personal ist extrem freundlich und hilfsbereit. Lässt keine Wünsche übrig. Zimmerservice ist rasch und unkompliziert. Zimmer wurde immer so sauber gemacht wann wir nicht da waren, wir wurden nie gestört oder so.
Cocktails an der Bar sind super.

Alles in allem war alles zu vollsten Zufriedenheit.
title: Super Hotel, Perfekter Urlaub im Pondok Bambu

text:
Wij zijn net terug van een heerlijke 2 weken op pondok bambu! Gelijk vanaf het begin een goed gevoel met een vriendelijk ontvangst en welkomst drankje. Kamers waren ruim en zeer netjes. Het personeel was vriendelijk en stond er gelijk als je ze nodig hebt. 

Vergeet ook niet een duik te maken met het ervaren duikteam. 

Kortom geweldig verblijf gehad.
title: Super!!

text:
Hier kom ik zeker terug.
Ruime schone kamers (huisjes), goed verzorgde tuin en zwembad.
Personeel zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
Het ontbijt en restaurant prima.
Niet al te groot resort , goed vertoeven daar.
Was voor ons een zeer goede keuze.
title: Schoon en relaxed bedrijf

text:
Geweldig hotel! 
Er heerst een hele gemoedelijke sfeer, lief personeel, prachtig zwembad en heel goed eten. 
Echt een vakantie paradijs!
Dikke aanrader voor zowel gezinnen, stellen als singles. 
Wij komen hier zeker nog eens terug.
title: Aanrader!

text:
Ons eerste bezoek aan Pondok Bambu was er eentje om nooit te vergeten! 
Daar hebben wij het Bali virus opgelopen.
